# Rama Chetan Atmudi üëã

Software Engineer at Ford Motor Company | Miracle Software | Generative AI

## About Me
My focus is on developing impactful Gen AI-powered applications, particularly leveraging Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Agentic Systems, to solve real-world problems and drive innovation.

## Key Skills & Gen AI Focus
- Generative AI Application Development
- Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) System Design & Optimization
- Prompt Engineering & Optimization Strategies
- LLM Integration & Orchestration (Langchain, LlamaIndex)
- Agentic Systems & Multi-Agent Workflows (AutoGen)
- Vector Databases & Semantic Search (e.g., Pinecone, ChromaDB, Weaviate)
- Experience with Foundational Models (GPT series, Gemini, Llama, etc.)
- Fine-tuning & Model Adaptation Techniques
- LLM Evaluation & Responsible AI Practices
- Full-Stack Development (Python, React, FastAPI/Flask)
- Cloud AI Platforms (GCP Vertex AI, Azure OpenAI)
- MLOps for AI Applications
